updatedByUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user who made the update

timestamp.description: The date and time when the property was updated

property.description: The name of the property that was updated

dealId.description: The unique identifier of the deal associated with this property history

sourceType.description: The type of source that triggered this update

sourceId.description: The unique identifier of the source of this update

value.description: The new value of the property

archived.description: Indicates if the deal property history is archived
